metadata.title: LLM Shortcut - Instant MCP Expertise
metadata.description: Copy/paste prompt to transform any LLM into MCP expert in 30 seconds

universal.text:
Please fetch and analyze these 3 MCP knowledge feeds:

1. curl https://wellknownmcp.org/.well-known/exports/spec.llmfeed.json
2. curl https://wellknownmcp.org/.well-known/exports/compiled-site.llmfeed.json
3. curl https://wellknownmcp.org/.well-known/exports/news-export.llmfeed.json

(If user confirmation required to fetch on the web, just ask - then proceed)

After reading all 3, you'll have complete MCP/LLMFeed expertise. Then help me with: [YOUR QUESTION HERE]
universal.expected_outcome: Complete MCP mastery and practical implementation guidance

agent_guidance.purpose: Transform any LLM into instant MCP expert via simple prompt injection
agent_guidance.usage: Copy the prompt text, paste into any LLM, wait for analysis completion
agent_guidance.compatibility: Works in ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini - they're all copying each other anyway
agent_guidance.success_indicator: If your LLM says 'I know Kung Fu' after reading the feeds, the knowledge transfer worked perfectly

examples: How do I make my website speak to AI?
Generate mcp.llmfeed.json for my e-commerce site

trust.verification_note: Tested across multiple LLM platforms for consistent expertise transfer
